content.text: Change 5.2 square metres into square centimetres

Write down the next prime number after 47

Hans invests \(750 for 8\) years at a rate of \(2\%\) per year simple interest
During her holiday, Hannah rents a bike
She pays a fixed cost of \(8 and then a cost of\) 4.50 per day
Hannah pays with a \(\) 50\(note and receives\) \ \(10.50\) change
Calculate for how many days Hannah rents the bike
Write down the mathematical name for triangle \(AEB\)
In the diagram lines \(AC\) and \(DF\) are parallel and \(AE = EB\)
Calculate, writing the answer in standard form
